reviews.text: No one speaks English, which is surprising if they have tourists, so it was almost impossible to communicate. Breakfast buffet with few varieties, dirty eating areas, everything cold. Average room. Really unpleasant staff. I had booked for 5 days, but I left on the second day, since staying in that place is really impossible. Not recommended at all.

My girlfriend and me wanted to reach the Panorama Restaurant and asked at the reception desk.

Black haired woman denied of having a restaurant or bar in the hotel, telling us extremely rudely to go outside to find one. The lobby bar was 5 meters away from us, with people enjoying some drinks. Ridiculous and obvious lie.

We are happy we did not book a room here.
Nice hotel in the Russian Embassy neighborhood.  It is clean, attentive staff in a safe area. It is a short walk to the subway/metro. Only 200 meters.
